Setlists.header_title: Paste, preview, and download a stage-ready PDF
Setlists.header_subtitle: Enter one song per line. Hebrew text is rendered right-to-left and uses performance-friendly fonts.
Setlists.tip_dash_break: Tip: type - on its own line to add a visual break in the PDF.
Setlists.tip_pipe_note: Tip: add a mini note with a pipe, e.g. ‚ÄúBillie Jean | F# minor, 118 BPM‚Äù.
Setlists.library_description: Soon you‚Äôll be able to save setlists, attach them to gigs, and reuse them for future shows.
Setlists.toast_no_songs_description: Paste at least one line into the setlist.
Setlists.toast_download_error_description_generic: Please try again in a moment.
Setlists.preview_list_placeholder: Paste your setlist on the left to see it here.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to manage your gigs
auth.signUpDescription: Create an account to start packing gigs

dashboard.title: Your gigs
dashboard.description: Pack all the details your bandmates need‚Äîtimes, setlist, venue, who's playing‚Äîinto one shareable page.
dashboard.noGigsDescription: Pack your first gig to get started
dashboard.noGigsSubDescription: Everything the band needs in one place‚Äîsetlist, times, venue, dress code, all ready to share.
dashboard.editGigPackDescription: Update details and save right here.
dashboard.createGigPackDescription: Fill in what the band needs to know.

gigpack.setlistPlaceholder:
Song Name - Artist - Key

gigpack.designDescription: Pick how your gig page looks
gigpack.themeVintagePosterDescription: Bold retro vibe like a classic gig poster
gigpack.brandingDescription: Add your band's logo, colors, and style
gigpack.bandLogoDescription: Show your logo on the gig page
gigpack.heroImageDescription: Big visual at the top‚Äîpromo image or poster
gigpack.dressCodePlaceholder: All black, business casual, themed costumes, etc.
gigpack.backlineNotesPlaceholder: Full PA provided. Bring your own bass amp. House kit available...
gigpack.parkingNotesPlaceholder: Street parking on King St. Loading entrance in back alley...
gigpack.paymentNotesPlaceholder: $800 split 4 ways, cash after the gig...
gigpack.internalNotesPlaceholder: Personal reminders, contact numbers, anything you don't want on the public page...
gigpack.internalNotesDescription: Won't show on the public page‚Äîonly you can see this
gigpack.packingChecklistDescription: Things you want everyone to remember (in-ears, charts, pedals, etc.). Each player can tick these off on their own device.
gigpack.createdDescription: Your gig is ready to share
gigpack.gigMoodDescription: What's the vibe? High energy, laid back, background‚Ä¶

public.stageOptimizedView: Big fonts for rehearsal and stage
public.packingChecklistHint: Tick these off as you pack your stuff.

share.title: Share with the band
share.description: Send this link so everyone has the details.

share.qrCodeHint: At rehearsal? Let everyone scan this from your screen.

Hey! Here's everything for {title} ‚Äì times, setlist, dress code, all in one place:

share.message2:
Hey,

Here's the gig page for {title} on {date} at {venue}. Has times, setlist, and all the details:

templates.howToStart: Start from scratch or use a template?
templates.startScratchDescription: A blank slate for your gig details.
templates.useTemplateDescription: Start with pre-filled defaults for common gig types.

templates.templateSavedDescription: You can now use this template for new gigs.
